title: Manipulation and detection of single nanoparticles and biomolecules by a photonic nanojet
title_cn: 通过光子纳米射流操纵和检测单个纳米颗粒和生物分子
abstract: Optical methods to manipulate and detect nanoscale objects are highly desired in both nanomaterials and molecular biology fields. Optical tweezers have been used to manipulate objects that range in size from a few hundred nanometres to several micrometres. The emergence of near-field methods that overcome the diffraction limit has enabled the manipulation of objects below 100 nm. A highly free manipulation with signal-enhanced real-time detection, however, remains a challenge for single sub-100-nm nanoparticles or biomolecules. Here we show an approach that uses a photonic nanojet to perform the manipulation and detection of single sub-100-nm objects. With the photonic nanojet generated by a dielectric microlens bound to an optical fibre probe, three-dimensional manipulations were achieved for a single 85-nm fluorescent polystyrene nanoparticle as well as for a plasmid DNA molecule. Backscattering and fluorescent signals were detected with the enhancement factors up to ∼103 and ∼30, respectively. The demonstrated approach provides a potentially powerful tool for nanostructure assembly, biosensing and single-biomolecule studies.
abstract_cn: 在纳米材料和分子生物学领域都非常需要光学方法来操纵和检测纳米级物体。光学镊子已经被用来操纵尺寸从几百纳米到几微米的物体。克服了衍射极限的近场方法的出现使得能够操纵100nm以下的物体。但是，具有信号增强的实时检测功能的高度自由的操作对于单个100 nm以下的纳米颗粒或生物分子仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们展示了一种使用光子纳米射流来执行单个100 nm以下物体的操纵和检测的方法。通过将电介质微透镜所产生的光子纳米射流束缚在光纤探针上，可以对单个85 nm荧光聚苯乙烯纳米颗粒以及质粒DNA分子进行三维操纵。检测到的反向散射和荧光信号的增强因子分别高达＆＃8764; 10 3 和＆＃8764; 30。该方法为纳米结构组装，生物传感和单生物分子研究提供了潜在强大的工具。

title: Concealing arbitrary objects remotely with multi-folded transformation optics
title_cn: 使用多重转换光学元件远程隐藏任意物体
abstract: An invisibility cloak that can hide an arbitrary object external to the cloak itself has not been devised before. In this Letter, we introduce a novel way to design a remote cloaking device that makes any object located at a certain distance invisible. This is accomplished using multi-folded transformation optics to remotely generate a hidden region around the object that no field can penetrate and that does not disturb the far-field scattering electromagnetic field. As a result, any object in the hidden region can stay in position or move freely within that region and remain invisible. Our idea is further extended in order to design a remote illusion optics that can transform any arbitrary object into another one. Unlike other cloaking methods, this method would require no knowledge of the details of the object itself. The proposed multi-folded transformation optics will be crucial in the design of remote devices in a variety of contexts.
abstract_cn: 一种隐身斗篷，以前没有设计过，它可以隐藏隐身斗篷外部的任意对象。 在这封信中，我们介绍了一种新颖的方法来设计远程隐身设备，该隐身设备使位于一定距离处的任何物体都不可见。 这可以通过使用多重转换光学器件在对象周围远程生成一个隐藏区域来实现，该区域没有磁场可以穿透并且不会干扰远场散射电磁场。 结果，隐藏区域中的任何对象都可以在该区域中保持位置或自由移动并保持不可见。 我们的想法得到进一步扩展，以设计一种可以将任何任意物体转换为另一个物体的远程错觉光学系统。 与其他伪装方法不同，此方法不需要了解对象本身的详细信息。 所提出的多重转换光学器件对于在各种情况下的远程设备设计至关重要。

title: Excitation and propagation of surface plasmon polaritons on a non-structured surface with a permittivity gradient
title_cn: 在非结构化表面上具有介电常数梯度的表面等离激元极化子的激发和传播
abstract: Accompanied by the rise of plasmonic materials beyond those based on noble metals and the development of advanced materials processing techniques, it is important to understand the plasmonic behavior of materials with large-scale inhomogeneity (such as gradient permittivity materials) because they cannot be modeled simply as scatterers. In this paper, we theoretically analyze the excitation and propagation of surface plasmon polaritons (SPPs) on a planar interface between a homogeneous dielectric and a material with a gradient of negative permittivity. We demonstrate the following: (i) free-space propagating waves and surface waves can be coupled by a gradient negative-permittivity material and (ii) the coupling can be enhanced if the material permittivity variation is suitably designed. This theory is then verified by numerical simulations. A direct application of this theory, ‘rainbow trapping’, is also proposed, considering a realistic design based on doped indium antimonide. This theory may lead to various applications, such as ultracompact spectroscopy and dynamically controllable generation of SPPs.
abstract_cn: 伴随着基于贵金属的等离激元材料的兴起以及先进材料加工技术的发展，了解具有大范围不均匀性的材料（例如梯度介电材料）的等离子行为非常重要，因为它们无法被简单地建模为散射体。在本文中，我们从理论上分析了均质电介质与具有负介电常数梯度的材料之间的平面界面上的表面等离激元极化子（SPP）的激发和传播。我们证明以下内容：（i）梯度负介电常数材料可以耦合自由空间传播波和表面波，并且（ii）如果材料介电常数变化得到适当设计，则可以增强耦合。然后通过数值模拟验证了该理论。考虑到基于掺杂的锑化铟的现实设计，还提出了该理论的直接应用“彩虹捕获”。该理论可能会导致各种应用，例如超紧凑光谱学和动态可控的SPP生成。

title: Ultrahigh-speed distributed Brillouin reflectometry
title_cn: 超高速分布式布里渊反射计
abstract: Optical fibre sensors based on Brillouin scattering have been vigorously studied in the context of structural health monitoring on account of their capacity for distributed strain and temperature measurements. However, real-time distributed strain measurement has been achieved only for two-end-access systems; such systems reduce the degree of freedom in embedding the sensors into structures, and furthermore render the measurement no longer feasible when extremely high loss or breakage occurs at a point along the sensing fibre. Here, we demonstrate real-time distributed measurement with an intrinsically one-end-access reflectometry configuration by using a correlation-domain technique. In this method, the Brillouin gain spectrum is obtained at high speed using a voltage-controlled oscillator, and the Brillouin frequency shift is converted into a phase delay of a synchronous sinusoidal waveform; the phase delay is subsequently converted into a voltage, which can be directly measured. When a single-point measurement is performed at an arbitrary position, a strain sampling rate of up to 100 kHz is experimentally verified by detecting locally applied dynamic strain at 1 kHz. When distributed measurements are performed at 100 points with 10 times averaging, a repetition rate of 100 Hz is verified by tracking a mechanical wave propagating along the fibre. Some drawbacks of this ultrahigh-speed configuration, including the reduced measurement accuracy, lowered spatial resolution and limited strain dynamic range, are also discussed.
abstract_cn: 基于布里渊散射的光纤传感器已经在结构健康监测的背景下进行了深入研究，因为它们具有分布式应变和温度测量的能力。但是，仅对两端访问系统实现了实时分布式应变测量。这样的系统降低了将传感器嵌入到结构中的自由度，并且此外，当在沿着传感光纤的一点上发生极高的损耗或断裂时，测量不再可行。在这里，我们通过使用相关域技术演示了本质上具有单端访问反射测量配置的实时分布式测量。在这种方法中，使用电压控制振荡器高速获得布里渊增益频谱，并将布里渊频移转换为同步正弦波形的相位延迟；随后将相位延迟转换为可以直接测量的电压。当在任意位置执行单点测量时，通过检测1＆＃8201kHz的局部施加的动态应变，实验可验证高达100＆＃8201kHz的应变采样率。当在100个点上执行10次平均的分布式测量时，通过跟踪沿着光纤传播的机械波，可以验证100 Hz的重复率。还讨论了这种超高速配置的一些缺点，包括降低的测量精度，降低的空间分辨率和有限的应变动态范围。

title: Functional optoacoustic neuro-tomography for scalable whole-brain monitoring of calcium indicators
title_cn: 功能性光声神经断层扫描，可用于全脑监测钙指示剂
abstract: Non-invasive observation of spatiotemporal activity of large neural populations distributed over entire brains is a longstanding goal of neuroscience. We developed a volumetric multispectral optoacoustic tomography platform for imaging neural activation deep in scattering brains. It can record 100 volumetric frames per second across scalable fields of view ranging between 50 and 1000 mm3 with respective spatial resolution of 35–200 μm. Experiments performed in immobilized and freely swimming larvae and in adult zebrafish brains expressing the genetically encoded calcium indicator GCaMP5G demonstrate, for the first time, the fundamental ability to directly track neural dynamics using optoacoustics while overcoming the longstanding penetration barrier of optical imaging in scattering brains. The newly developed platform thus offers unprecedented capabilities for functional whole-brain observations of fast calcium dynamics; in combination with optoacoustics' well-established capacity for resolving vascular hemodynamics, it could open new vistas in the study of neural activity and neurovascular coupling in health and disease.
abstract_cn: 无创地观察分布在整个大脑中的大型神经群体的时空活动是神经科学的长期目标。我们开发了一个体积多光谱光声层析成像平台，用于对散射脑深处的神经激活进行成像。它可以在范围为50到1000mm 3的可伸缩视场中每秒记录100个体积帧，各自的空间分辨率为35 m 200。在固定和自由游泳的幼虫以及表达遗传编码钙指示剂GCaMP5G的成年斑马鱼大脑中进行的实验首次证明了使用光声技术直接追踪神经动力学的基本能力，同时克服了光学成像在散射大脑中长期存在的渗透障碍。因此，新开发的平台为快速钙动力学的功能性全脑观察提供了前所未有的功能。结合光声技术已建立的解决血管血流动力学的能力，它可以为研究健康和疾病中的神经活动和神经血管耦合提供新的前景。

title: Intermittent chaos for ergodic light trapping in a photonic fiber plate
title_cn: 光子纤维板中遍历光捕获的间歇性混乱
abstract: Extracting the light trapped in a waveguide, or the opposite effect of trapping light in a thin region and guiding it perpendicular to its incident propagation direction, is essential for optimal energetic performance in illumination, display or light harvesting devices. Here we demonstrate that the paradoxical goal of letting as much light in or out while maintaining the wave effectively trapped can be achieved with a periodic array of interpenetrated fibers forming a photonic fiber plate. Photons entering perpendicular to that plate may be trapped in an intermittent chaotic trajectory, leading to an optically ergodic system. We fabricated such a photonic fiber plate and showed that for a solar cell incorporated on one of the plate surfaces, light absorption is greatly enhanced. Confirming this, we found the unexpected result that a more chaotic photon trajectory reduces the production of photon scattering entropy.
abstract_cn: 对于在照明，显示或光收集设备中的最佳能量性能，提取在波导中捕获的光或在较薄区域捕获光并垂直于其入射传播方向进行引导的相反效果至关重要。 在这里，我们证明了通过形成光子纤维板的互穿纤维的周期性阵列可以实现在保持有效捕获的波的同时允许进出或出出更多光的悖论性目标。 垂直于该板入射的光子可能会陷入间歇性的混沌轨迹中，从而形成光学遍历系统。 我们制造了这种光子纤维板，结果表明，对于结合在板表面之一上的太阳能电池，光吸收会大大增强。 证实这一点，我们发现了意想不到的结果，即更混乱的光子轨迹降低了光子散射熵的产生。
